# Service Device Provisioning Services

```text
azure-v2/Item/IoT/ServiceDeviceProvisioningServices
```

```text
include('azure-v2/Item/IoT/ServiceDeviceProvisioningServices')
```

|icon|card|element|group|
|---|---|---|---|
|![](ServiceDeviceProvisioningServices.png)|![](ServiceDeviceProvisioningServices.card.png)|![](ServiceDeviceProvisioningServices.element.png)|![](ServiceDeviceProvisioningServices.group.png)|



## card
### Load remotely
```plantuml
@startuml
' configures the library
!global $LIB_BASE_LOCATION="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tmorin/plantuml-libs/master/dist"
' loads the library
!include $LIB_BASE_LOCATION/bootstrap.puml
' loads the azure-v2 bootstrap
include('azure-v2/bootstrap')
' loads the ServiceDeviceProvisioningServices element
include('azure-v2/Item/IoT/ServiceDeviceProvisioningServices')
ServiceDeviceProvisioningServicesCard('service_device_provisioning_services', 'Service Device Provisioning Services', 'Molestiae praesentium aut natus dolorem. Aut consequatur fugiat a consequatur ut.')
@enduml
```
### Load locally
```plantuml
@startuml
' configures the library
!global $INCLUSION_MODE="local"
!global $LIB_BASE_LOCATION="../../.."
' loads the library
!include $LIB_BASE_LOCATION/bootstrap.puml
' loads the azure-v2 bootstrap
include('azure-v2/bootstrap')
' loads the ServiceDeviceProvisioningServices element
include('azure-v2/Item/IoT/ServiceDeviceProvisioningServices')
ServiceDeviceProvisioningServicesCard('service_device_provisioning_services', 'Service Device Provisioning Services', 'Molestiae praesentium aut natus dolorem. Aut consequatur fugiat a consequatur ut.')
@enduml
```

```plantuml
the content of the group
end note
}
@enduml
```
